_source.short_desc: You deserve a legal platform that works just as hard as you do. Run your firm from one tab. Only with Centerbase.
_source.long_desc: You want to grow your firm and impress your clients without adding extra admin work. Do it by replacing your excessive browser tabs and overcomplicated software with just one intuitive platform. Only with Centerbase. Now with a FREE starting balance migration!
_source.target_audience: If you're a midsize firm, we can support you. No matter the practice area, you can modernize your firm without losing the legacy features you already love.

category_features.name: Billing & Invoicing

related_products.short_desc: Ranked #1, Clio is the leading law practice management software with the most 5-star reviews.  Schedule a live demo to learn more.
related_products.features: Ranked #1, Clio is the leading law practice management software with the most 5-star reviews and the only legal software with over 1,000 reviews on Capterra. Clio is a cloud-based legal practice management solution that lets you manage your law firm securely from anywhere. Access and manage your work in one central system - with matters, contacts, billing, and everything you need in one place. Schedule a live demo to learn more.

related_products.short_desc: Mobile friendly and secure legal software that's easy to learn and use. Save time. Grow your firm. Go paperless. Work from anywhere.
related_products.features: PracticePanther is the top rated law practice management software on Capterra! See why tens of thousands of law firms in over 170 countries use PracticePanther to automate their workflows and get more done in less time. Never miss deadlines, get paid faster, seamlessly track billable time & expenses. Work from anywhere, on any device, with our mobile app. It's easy, user-friendly and intuitive. Spend less time managing your firm and more time making money. Try it free, no credit card needed.

related_products.short_desc: MyCase is a top-rated, complete law practice management solution with all the tools firms need to run a better practice, from anywhere.
related_products.features: MyCase is a top-rated, end-to-end law practice management solution that helps firms run efficiently from anywhere, provide an exceptional client experience, and easily track firm performance. Streamline day-to-day firm processes in one, easy to adopt solution -- lead tracking, client intake, case management, eSignature, billing, payments and more. Start your free trial (no credit card required) today!

related_products.short_desc: AbacusLaw is a turn-key, fully integrated Case Management Solution for firms of all sizes, in all practice areas and jurisdictions.
related_products.features: AbacusLaw is a turn-key, fully integrated law practice management solution. Founded in 1983, AbacusLaw works for firms of any size in every industry. Features include rules-based calendaring, document / form automation, matter management, conflict checking, contact management, document and email management, time tracking, billing, balance, accounting, trust accounting and more. AbacusLaw is also available in our private cloud for a complete disaster-proof solution.

related_products.short_desc: CosmoLex is the only cloud-based, total practice management, billing, and accounting system (no QuickBooks? required).
related_products.features: Thousands of law firms have switched to CosmoLex - the only cloud-based, law practice management software with built-in, compliant legal accounting (no QuickBooks needed). CosmoLex eliminates the struggle of juggling separate systems for law practice management, billing, and accounting. LawPay credit card processing is also built-in with no fixed monthly fee. Simply log into CosmoLex Cloud - anytime, anywhere - to get everything you need to run your entire law practice. Try free today!

related_products.short_desc: The best CRM for lawyers. It helps manage Contacts, Projects, and Timesheets. It's great because it sits right within your Outlook.
related_products.features:
The best CRM for lawyers. It helps you manage your Clients and Cases (Projects) right from within Microsoft Outlook. Our mobile and web apps allow you to stay on top even on the go.

Organize emails and meetings automatically by projects, automate repetitive tasks with workflow, track your time, customize forms, and much more.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based legal practice management software for law firms wishing to become more efficient. Access from anywhere at any time.
related_products.features:
Cloud-based legal practice management software helping law firms to become more efficient and make more money. The powerful features allow you to manage your practice from anywhere, any time and from any device with real-time matter and client information.

Continually investing in R&D of its many productivity tools its technology ensures SME law firms have access to the very latest legal technology.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based legal practice management with all the tools you need to run a more productive and profitable law firm.
related_products.features: Run a more productive and profitable law firm from anywhere with Rocket Matter legal practice management. Trusted by thousands of attorneys for over 12 years for unparalleled product and service. Our intuitive cloud-based software has all the tools you need to become more automated, more profitable, and more on top of your business. Become a lean, modern, automated law firm with Rocket Matter. See it in action with a personalized walk-through. Or try us free for 15 days, no credit card required!

related_products.short_desc: The best law practice management software for small law firms. When it's time to get serious about your firm, it's time for Smokeball.
related_products.features: Smokeball is the only cloud-based legal case management software that also runs from your desktop. Manage all of your matters with collaborative case management; customize your commonly used forms with a single click in document automation; pull up-to-date local forms from our library of 20,000+ court documents; track your billable hours across programs without a single click; bill, e-file, and collect all in one place. Try Smokeball law manager software and see all of its benefits for yourself!

related_products.short_desc: Practice Management software that integrates your information into a single system for improved efficiency and profitability.
related_products.features: Amicus Attorney is an intuitive case management solution that tracks and invoices billable time, automates important documents, and provides easy access to all your clients and case files. Work from your desktop or in the private cloud while integrating with QuickBooks and other applications.

related_products.short_desc: The #1 Most Customizable, Legal Case, Matter & Project Management Trusted by Over 50,000 Professionals. Get a Personalized Demo.
related_products.features: Filevine is the #1 most customizable law practice management software. Don't waste your valuable time on a free trial - Filevine is customized to how you do business and adapts to how your team evolves. Exceptional collaboration tools enable your team to focus on what matters, with automatic task assignments, easy reporting, texting, and emailing. Free, unlimited data storage in the cloud.   Soc 2 Type II certification ensures that your data is protected with the best security.

similar_products.short_desc: Designed to help you use proven case management best practices, so you don't need to reinvent the wheel.
similar_products.features:
Practice management is case management + business analytics.

Backdocket was designed to use proven case management best practices, so you don't need to reinvent the wheel. Backdocket then adds business analytics to your case management, so you can see what's making your firm successful.

Available at a competitive price, backdocket is also backed by a free demo as well as free tech support and free onboarding for new firms.

similar_products.short_desc: CASEpeer online case management software is built for personal injury law firms. Easy to use, and easy to implement.
similar_products.features:
CASEpeer is the leading practice management solution built for personal injury law firms. 

Supercharge your law firm with a cloud-based plaintiffs' practice management solution. With cases and reporting accessible anywhere, anytime, you can execute on outcomes like never before.

CASEpeer provides you with the case and practice management tools that allow you to focus on what matters most -- your clients.

similar_products.short_desc:
SECURE AND CLOUDLESS - Law Office Billing/ Management Software
for solo and small law offices, comprehensive system. FREE Data Import!
similar_products.features:
SECURE AND CLOUDLESS Law Office Practice Management Software -
ProTempus is a world-class, comprehensive system designed for solo and small law firms. Our unique technology keeps your data on your local network, not in the cloud, and your authorized staff has access to all your data through the sharable database. Billing/ invoicing, Case Management, Calendar / Time keeping, Trust accounting, Contact and Task Management, AR, AP, GL are just a few of our features. FREE data imports of your data!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Court Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Court Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Court Management software provides solutions for case management including docketing, workflow, calendar, concise case summaries, judicial assignments, and more. Court Management software is related to Legal Case Management software, Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Billing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Billing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Billing software automates time tracking, billing, calendaring and accounting for law practices. These applications facilitate legal-style hourly billing and recording of case-related expenses. Many Legal Billing solutions also feature integration for a broad range of case and workflow management tools as well as accounting and payroll features across multiple office locations. Legal Billing software is related to Law Practice Management software, Professional Services Automation software and Time and Expense software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Calendar software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Calendar tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Calendar software helps attorneys to manage their schedules. These applications allow users to schedule events and appointments, set deadline reminders and notifies of any conflicts. Legal Calendar software is related to Court Management software, Law Practice Management software, Legal Billing software and Legal Case Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Case Management software coordinates documents, scheduling, conflicts, contacts, and reporting associated with legal cases. These applications enable an integrated solution to automate case management, client history tracking, and contracts as well as billing and accounting. Legal Case Management solutions also often include database management, electronic discovery, and automatic document template editing features, enabling organizations to manage, distribute, and update key case-related data. Legal Case Management software is related to Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Document Management software allows legal professionals to organize and quickly access electronically-stored legal documents. Scanning, imaging, and merging allow these documents to be included in a database that is searchable and sortable in any number of ways. This type of software can also allow for transcript and transcription management. Legal Document Management software is related to Document Management software, Legal Case Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Court Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Research software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Research tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Research software and services aggregate court judgements, legislation, regulations and case law from a variety of sources as well as provide tools for automating legislation discovery and analysis.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Trust Accounting software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Trust Accounting tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Trust Accounting software allows administrators to manage trusts, estates and investment portfolios. Trust Accounting solutions can be used by bank trust departments, accountants, law firms, non-profit organizations and independent trust companies and helps to keep administrators in compliance with all applicable laws and regulations. Trust Accounting software is related to Accounting software, Fund Accounting software, Law Practice Management software, Investment Management software and Legal Billing software.
